website_summaries.verdict: A machine with a larger water reservoir than comparable models.
pros: water reservoir holds more than other models so doesn't need to be refilled as frequently
The capsule bin is also larger and needs to be emptied less often
and is compatible with coffee and espresso capsules
Comes with a handy milk frother, too
cons: Pods are expensive and aren't available at all grocery stores

customer_reviews.title: Quality hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: After owning a keurig machine and being disappointed with the coffee as compared to using fresh ground coffee I was reluctant to get a Nespresso machine. After my wife ordered this my mind has been changed. The coffee comes out hot and after trying many types, most are very tasty. The milk frother works perfectly. Adding warm frothed milk helps keep the coffee hot. The frother also has a cold setting if that is what you prefer. The machine feels sturdy and not likely to break with long term use. I would highly recommend this machine to anyone who appreciates good tasting coffee.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: How I wish that there's a 0 star option for this product. I ordered and paid for a brand new product. Amazon send me an OPEN-BOX. The water tank is broken and when I'm trying to use it the first time, the tank exploded and splattered water all over my kitchen; soaking my toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine broke down..!!!
customer_reviews.text: The device stopped working after 6 months... so disappointed. Not sure if it comes with wareanty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn't come out when make coffee sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I just have a quick question, I bought this item about two weeks after my first time used, the 2nd and 3rd time, the water pump seems not come out the water when made coffee, the coffee only can make half cup sometimes, I need to reopen the coffee machine and replace the capsules again and relock and press the start button, try 2-3 times, then, can make one full cup of coffee. I wonder either my way used wrong or the pipe has partially blocked.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: this makes awesome and hot coffee drinks
customer_reviews.text: Do it!!!!! I spent way too much time researching this.... The biggest gripe people had was the temperature....this makes awesome and hot coffee drinks. I could not be happier with this purchase. The aeroccino is awesome too!!.. Enjoy your personal coffee shop experience by pushing a button. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: We love our Nesspresso. The red color makes it fun. Everything was in Nesspresso box (inside a amazon box), milk frothier and coffee samples. Coffee is NOT bitter. It’s full of flavor. I drank 0 cups per day, now I enjoy 2, yum. The milk frothier works great however if you like a whip cream consistency this is not for you. Coffee pot easy to use even for my week hands. Some say coffee is not hot enough. I say it’s perfect to drink without burning your mouth. I think when coffee get to hot it becomes bitter. Just my opinion. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: LSDP

customer_reviews.title: Best appliance purchase I’ve ever made!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When we were at our all inclusive resort in Mexico they had the Nespresso machines for guests. I immediately fell in love. When quarantine hit I didn’t have access to Starbucks so I decided to purchase. It is by far my favorite appliance I’ve ever had. Might be the best purchase I’ve ever made. LOVE the coffee it brews. It’s creamy and has an amazing taste. Easy to clean and lots of options to make any barista drink with the milk frother. I can make perfect cappuccino, Carmel lattes or my favorite iced coffee. I have people drop by just to have one of my coffees because it’s so great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got for vacations
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something that we could take with us on vacations. Not that you can take this in your suitcase, but when we travel by car. This machine does a wonderful job and the frother is wonderful with milk, but not almond milk. It can be a little hard, which we found out to find the coffee pods, so be sure to get before you go. We did however order them and had them sent to us at our timeshare and it was delivered the next day. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Very professional!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this machine! Easy to fill water ,catches the capsules ,and heats up quickly. Easy to hack the capsules to use your favorite espresso coffees!
customer_reviews.author: WKR

customer_reviews.title: Missing and broke key parts
customer_reviews.text: The description said the box was damaged which it was; however the tray for front of the coffee machine is missing. The water container is broken at the valve and needs to be fixed. I’m super disappointed and annoyed with this!
customer_reviews.author: Tmc

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a barista!
customer_reviews.text: I went from having instant coffee at night to this! I have my own coffee shop. The coffee has a crema on it. I make some fancy stuff now that turns heads. I like this thing so much that I made a coffee bar around it. Delish. Just wish the pods were available in more places and with more variety.
customer_reviews.author: jim b

customer_reviews.title: after 6 months frother no longer works not happy at all.
customer_reviews.text: I order my coffee maker in Nov 2019 and just about a month ago my frother broke and well it works it just heats the milk and that is all so I am not enjoying the coffee marker anymore without the frothing of the cream it is just not the some. now I need to order a new one. For the price I paid for the machine it should las longer then 6 months. Nothing last like they use to. I am not happy that you pay over $250 for something and you only get a few months out of it. Not good I will not reorder this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Ducommun

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks goodness I was able to purchase this machine before the rest of the world finds out about it. This is coffee on a whole new level. Sorry coffee shops, you don’t come close to this. And this company leads in sustainability by providing collection bags and free shipping for used pods so that they can be repurposed. I would pay double the price for this machine and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Duane C Olcsvary

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing product, makes great cappuccino and coffee, very easy to set up and clean. The only thing I dislike is how expensive the pods are to buy. I have started to use my caps refillable pods which work really well and are considerably cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cunniffe

customer_reviews.title: Better than any Keurig and coffee makers
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, just one button for any pod and the machine takes care of the rest. Love the taste and the foamy taste of the coffee. Frother is just way too easy to use and clean up takes seconds.
customer_reviews.author: OMG

customer_reviews.title: Better than k-cup
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We've been kcup users for years till our daughter got a Nespresso. So we tried it and love the tastes, strength choices, milk foamer, etc. The frother even works on various bean milks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We love the coffee. But...we have had it for only ONE year and today the motor was smoking, stopped making coffee, stopped running water through. Unable to even clean it. Also, we were gone for 6 months of the year....so it wasn't even used!!!! We wish we could DO something about this......
customer_reviews.author: Randy G.

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been my whole life!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a super automatic espresso machine for years. I was finally convinced to buy a Nepresso by my wife. It’s amazing! My much more expensive old school super automatic has now been retired to the closet. The frother that came packaged with this is also pretty darn good and I can froth while I brew. Magical!
customer_reviews.author: michelle allen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift that I bought for myself and it's the best gift so far. Even though purchasing the coffee pods is a pain because they are so exclusive, but I love this more the Keurig. Coffee tastes better, love the thick form on the top, not to mention it's not plastic, and Nespresso recycles all the used pods (for free, too).
customer_reviews.author: CTshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Bought as bday present for my mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for her birthday and it was a hit! The coffee, espresso, etc. that it makes are creamy and perfect. I love it so much I'm going to buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I think of when I open my eyes is my first cup of coffee using my Nespresso. My best friend has one of the originals and I love hers, but I have to say I love this one more. My coffee seems to be a bit hotter, so it doesn't cool off as fast. And the added bonus of the frother - perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Little Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee machine is the highlight of my day that allows me to promptly get up very early before work to enjoy a wonderful cup of coffee before facing the world each morning! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana H.

customer_reviews.title: Express Espresso
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift and never been to a Starbucks since then, absolutely love everything about it. So quick, so delicious and so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine as a gift to my boyfriend. He is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: EVA KORE

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: If you like strong coffee this is for you. It makes excellent strong coffee. I don’t like strong coffee
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Harris

customer_reviews.title: This machine will ruin coffee as you know it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to replace our Keurig that broke after a year. Excellent - Plan and simple. Buy one.
customer_reviews.author: JF2016Mb

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum yum!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my wife. She loves it, and I really like the coffee too. Way, way, way better than any Keurig I’ve tried. The only drawback is that the pods are not easy to find... Amazon is the best place to get them.
customer_reviews.author: G-Lew

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: The first one broke after the first couple of days. Reported it and the supplier replaced it very quickly. The new one is fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Shahin Tadayon

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Defective right out of the box. Power light came on once and then went out forever. Not even one cup of coffee! And then it cost $50 to return it. Stay away from this defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Heat Expresspark machine
customer_reviews.text: My customers love this expression machine while they wait for the appt.
customer_reviews.author: VYSP

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for years! So happy I finally got one.
customer_reviews.author: fsumpa08

customer_reviews.title: Fast but just for vertuo capsule
customer_reviews.text: Fast but just for vertuo capsule and a little too large.
customer_reviews.author: T_Tb

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best at home espresso machine!! The frothed is great!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, beautiful in red
customer_reviews.text: I had the black one but gave it to my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one month and water does not heat up.....not worth the money I paid
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Love love!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! Bought for my husband birthday and he loves that thing more than me lol
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: The taste
customer_reviews.text: Love to have a nice cup of coffee every morning before going to work. I would recommend anyone to buy it
customer_reviews.author: hector cortes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine and great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love how great the Espresso tastes and how great the machine works
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Is not working
customer_reviews.text: I’m having problems with the milk frother is not working it only work for about a week
customer_reviews.author: jose nunez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE NESPRESSO COFFEE!! This maker is perfect. I may buy one for work too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee all time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Got it with the milk frother. Gourmet coffee in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Badri Tiwari

customer_reviews.title: Not great !
customer_reviews.text: I returned it .None of the pods made great tasting coffee or espresso imo. Not hot enough either.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Linett

customer_reviews.title: Coffee House Quality Drinks at Home
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine. I can't say anything negative about it all honestly. I feel like I should come up with a negative just to make this a more thorough review but I cannot. Watch my video for the full story.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like my coffee scalding hot however
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. The problem is that as is mentioned in many of the previous reviews, the coffee it makes is simply not hot enough. I don't like my coffee scalding hot however, warm (120 degrees) is ridiculous and that is what this coffee maker produces. Nespresso will advise to warm your cup first which should help, it does, but so minimally it doesn't matter much. I really was looking forward to ownership of this coffee maker, unfortunately I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee & Espresso - One Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for about a year and use it daily. It works exactly as it did when brand new: great coffee and espresso with virtually no effort and very little cleanup needed. One FLAW: there is no indicator for when the reservoir is empty, and in fact the machine appears to go through a normal cycle even when there is no water. In my kitchen the reservoir is hard to see, and more than once I've run a capsule through only to find 1/2 of my usual shot or nothing at all in my cup. Easy to waste a capsule that way, and I wonder if it's good for the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Taste fresh,
customer_reviews.text: Irs an awesome machine, my coffee and expresso taste fresh and taste exactly like a fresh ground from Starbucks or any good quality Cafe
customer_reviews.author: ronya

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this crap get it somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: Seriously just look at the picture of the box.... did they drag it down the street for a while first. Box wasnt even sealed makes me really want to give this a present now...
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very disappointing. Package arrived in the actual box which ruined the surprise of a Xmas gift! The water tank was cracked beyond, so we can’t use the machine until we get a replacement tank.
customer_reviews.author: aaron l edmonds

customer_reviews.title: I'll never own a different brand
customer_reviews.text: I am completely spoiled now with this coffee. I love how every cup has a foamy head. You have a variety of strengths to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Phillips-Herman

customer_reviews.title: Works great and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant after reading negative reviews that the coffee wasn't hot enough. Well, it is hot enough and tastes great. I got a 40 count dark variety pack along with my red machine. Coffee tastes really good and frother works so easy. I have the Vertuo Evoluo model which has larger water reserve of 54 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meola

customer_reviews.title: Machine=ok  coffe capsules =Expensive
customer_reviews.text: The machine is nice but it make some noise,not that quite.the coffe capsules are very expensive.it almost Change my mind to buy the original line. The coffe taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Vache

customer_reviews.title: Love my Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how much I love my machine my daughter bought the older model with a smaller pods but I love the Nespresso it is totally awesome
customer_reviews.author: Mary Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nespresso Vertuo Evoluo Expresso maker. Quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Keener

customer_reviews.title: She loves her Nespresso machine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 20-year-old granddaughter to take back to college.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker & coffee I've ever had at home ...
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker & coffee I've ever had at home that didn't cost a over $200! If you love coffee, you got to have a Nespresso at home.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotta P Sorenstam

customer_reviews.title: Best Cup of Coffee EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and functional and makes the best coffee we’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Winslow's

customer_reviews.title: Technology driven
customer_reviews.text: The technology is in the product and how it process the coffe
customer_reviews.author: Jan P. Modesti Torres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lights out - this is really good coffee, but you 'godda like it strong - nice froth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nespresso Vertuo Coffee and Espresso Machine Bundle with Aeroccino Milk Frother by De'Longhi, Red
product_meta.description: Style:Machine + Aeroccino| Color:RedNespresso is constantly evolving the way you drink espresso and coffee. Offering freshly brewed coffee with crema as well as delicious, authentic Espresso, the Vertuo Evoluo machine conveniently makes two cup sizes, 7.7 fl. oz. Coffee and 1.35 fl. oz. Espresso, at the touch of a button. It uses two different capsule sizes: large capsule for Coffee and a small one for Espresso. Vertuo Evoluo coffee makers deliver a perfect cup of coffee time after time, thanks to Centrifusion, a patented extraction technology developed by Nespresso. Vertuo Evoluo uses an intelligent extraction system that recognizes each Grand Cru blend. Thanks to a barcode on the rim of the capsule, the brewing parameters are adjusted by the machine, with no need to change settings. This delivers the best in-cup result for your chosen variety - at the touch of a single button. The capsule is automatically ejected after brewing, with only 15-20 seconds of pre-heating time, while the automatic energy-saving function switches the machine off after 9 minutes of inactivity, consuming less energy. Each machine includes a welcome set with 12 VertuoLine capsules, each with varying intensities and taste profiles. The bundle includes the Aeroccino 3. It provides a smooth, finely textured hot or cold fresh milk froth for your coffee recipes via an ultra simple and fast automatic system, in a few seconds, without noise or vibration. The Aeroccino also heats milk for your Caffè Latte or Cappuccino.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE AUTOMATIC COFFEE MAKER: Brew different single-serve coffee cup sizes at the touch of a button depending on your coffee needs - Espresso (1. 35 ounce ), Double Espresso (2. 7 ounce ), Gran Lungo (5 ounce ), Coffee (7. 7 ounce ) and Alto (14 ounce ). Pour over ice to create your favorite iced Coffee drinks. Designed for use with Nespresso Vertuo capsules

SMART COFFEE MAKER: Brew the perfect single-serve coffee or Espresso drink time after time, thanks to Nespresso's Centrifusion (TM) technology using barcodes to deliver the best in-cup results including the perfect crema for large Coffee cup sizes. Simply insert the capsule and enjoy freshly brewed Coffee or authentic Espresso.

SINGLE SERVE COFFEE MACHINE: Have the ability to create barista grade brewed single-serve Coffee or Espresso cups at the touch of a single button. The one-touch button mechanism delivers the best in-cup result for whatever style Coffee or Espresso drink you choose. Designed for use with Nespresso Vertuo capsules only.

FEATURES: Extra large 54 ounce. water tank and a very large 17 count used capsule container. This machine also has a fast heat-up time of only 15 seconds meaning you will never have to wait too long for your favorite Coffee or Espresso drink to be ready. There is an energy-saving automatic shutoff at 9 minutes of inactivity.
COMPLIMENTARY GIFT: Each machine includes a welcome kit with a range of Vertuo capsules with unique aroma profiles.
BUNDLE: The Aeroccino 3 milk frother is included to create the perfect finish to your single-serve Coffee beverages such as Cappuccino or Latte.
